nodes.excerpt: Fixes in Windup 6.2.1.Final Fixed  Issues  report rendering when "Skip source code reports" option is enabled( WINDUP-3791 ) Web Console…
New features Some of the features below have been published in previous z-stream versions of Windup 6.1. But they have been listed here for…
New  --exitCodes  (or  -e ) option to get exit codes from CLI execution ( WINDUP-3612 ) Updated Maven artifact index up to 23.03.202…
Improved  GeneratedValue  related rule to cover more migration paths
New  hibernate6  target and rules for supporting the upgrade to Hibernate 6 ( WINDUPRULE-954 ,  WINDUPRULE-966 ,  WINDUPRULE-941 )
New ouput JSON summary option  --exportSummary  available ( WINDUP-3370 )
Dozens of new rules for the JBoss EAP 8 migration path Dependencies updates Resolved issues
Fix for the rule for migrating to Jakarta Faces 4.0 ( WINDUPRULE-942 )
New rule for the migration to Jakarta Faces 4.0 ( WINDUPRULE-894 ) XML rules' tests data maintenance Dependencies updates Resolved issues
New Windup operator  https://operatorhub.io/operator/windup-operator Web UI - optional authentication through an external Keycloak instance…
